document.full_text: fifa could help negotiate the release of japanese players from european clubs for july's copa america after the country pulled out of the tournament following last month's deadly earthquake and tsunami.
document.title: fifa may help japan for copa america, says jfa chief
lines_and_colors: fifa could help negotiate the release of japanese players from european clubs for july's copa america after the country pulled out of the tournament following last month's deadly earthquake and tsunami.
